forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 44. North northwest wind 2 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 56, with temperatures falling to around 54 in the afternoon. East wind around 5 mph.

weather_report:
Tonight in Downtown San Francisco, the skies present a serene clarity, a calm canvas punctuated only by the faint glow of distant lights. With a gentle north-northwest breeze whispering through the city, temperatures will settle around a crisp 44 degrees. The air feels almost purified, inviting a deep breath as the evening unfolds, layering the city in a hush that seems to cradle its many stories. 

As Saturday dawns, the city will embrace a mix of sun and scattered clouds. The sun’s gradual ascent hints at warmth, with the high nudging close to 56 degrees, before yielding to a cooler afternoon breeze. Fog may be lingering beyond the Golden Gate, but within the city, the day is set to unfurl pleasantly. An ideal way to experience this tranquil weather would be to slip into comfortable layers—perhaps a light sweater paired with a cloak of timeless denim—perfect for the gentle chill. Engaging in a leisurely stroll, perhaps along the waterfront or a quiet corner café, would allow for both warmth and connections with the vibrant hum of city life beneath a brushed canvas of blue and white.
